description:
The college student stepdaughter of a wealthy industrialist has seemingly attempted suicide twice, but Ryo finds out that someone wants her dead.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: A College Girl Plays Hardball For Love! Someone Is Trying To Kill Me
Joshidaisei Ai no Tsuppari! Dareka ga Watashi o Neratteru
女子大生愛のツッパリ! 誰かが私を狙ってる
